boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C7A23B.364F4B92" X-ASG-Orig-Subj: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) Subject: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) Date: Tue, 29 May 2007 16:48:50 -0500 Message-ID: <9A8EFDB8A197B8478D3FFE26E86C16DF05FB0C75@chexch.playboy.com> Thread-Topic: DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) Thread-Index: AceiOyR3Yjqh4H6QRZGYYvlKNUltPQ== Importance: high From: "Cherkashina, Tatyana" To: , Priority: Urgent X-Priority: 1 X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED X-OriginalArrivalTime: 29 May 2007 21:49:08.0654 (UTC) FILETIME=[2F786CE0:01C7A23B] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) May 29, 2007 Everyones Internet 390 Benmar Suite 200 Houston, TX 77060 US abuse@ev1servers.net ipadmin@ev1servers.net Dear Sir or Madam: It has been brought to our attention that web pages at Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. ("Playboy"). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy. I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) and on all web pages under your control. Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links: http://tarynterrell.net/ http://tarynterrell.net/videos.html http://tarynterrell.net/pictures.html http://tarynterrell.net/downloads.html I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is tcherkashina@playboy.com. We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately. This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC. Tatyana Cherkashina Intellectual Property Assistant cc: Ana Cashman, Esq. MIME element (text/html)

May 29, 2007

 

Everyones Internet

390 Benmar
Suite
200

Houston,

abuse@ev1servers.net

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. (“Playboy”). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy.

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on Tarynterrell.net (207.218.235.160) and on all web pages under your control.

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links:

http://tarynterrell.net/< /span>

http://tarynterrell.net/video s.html

http://tarynterrell.net/pic tures.html

http://tarynterrell.net/do wnloads.html

 

I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is tcherkashina@playboy.com.

We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately.

This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved.



PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.

Tatyana Cherkashina

Intellectual Property Assistant

 

cc: Ana Cashman, Esq.
